Dr. Norman Borlaug

Dr. Jose Gregorio Hernandez

Here's a time line of Dr. Jose Gregorio Hernandez's life:

  • 1864 Born in Isnot√∫, Trujillo. Venezuela
  • 1865 Baptized on January 30
  • 1872 His mother Josefa Antonia Cisnero dies
  • 1884-1889 He entered the UCV to study medicine and graduated as a doctor in 1888
  • 1889 He is awarded a scholarship to study in France, deepens his knowledge and fulfills a mission from the Venezuelan State: acquire scientific equipment for studies on bacteriology
  • 1908 He tries to become a monk in Italy
  • 1909 He tries to become a priest in Venezuela
  • 1919 He dies run over by a vehicle in La Pastora, Venezuela
  • 1949 The process of beatification and canonization begins
  • 1986 Pope John Paul the Second declares him Venerable

If you have time, you should read more about this incredible human being on his Wikipedia entry
